problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following is most likely to happen if \(\rho > 1\) in a system with an infinite queue? (\(\rho\) is the utilization of the system.)<<
( ) The line will go to 0 (x) The line will grow to infinity ( ) The wait time will go to 0.
[explanation] If \(\rho>1\), then there people are arriving into the system at a higher rate than people leaving the system. The line will most likely continue to grow to infinity. [explanation]
